comment.author: 8229897@N03
comment._content: The mountain village is correctly spelled Ruidoso.  It is in southern New Mexico

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/quiltdiva] Thank you for your comment. 
I see in the image description, next to Place, it's listed as "Ruidoso; Lincoln County; New Mexico; USA." Which makes me wonder if the title is a misprint. I'll bring this to the attention of my colleagues at National Museum of the American Indian. 

Susannah
Smithsonian Institution Archives
